excerpt: Park with hiking trails, a tower & a cable car offering views of the famed 130-m. Caracol Falls.
detail_description: Caracol Park, located in Canela, is a must-visit destination known for its iconic Caracol Waterfall. The park offers hiking trails and a 30-meter tower with a panoramic elevator providing a 360-degree view of the surroundings. Visitors can also enjoy the breathtaking views of the 130-meter Caracol Falls from a cable car.
name: Caracol Park
address: Rodovia RS 466, km 0, s/n, Caracol, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Lively amusement park offering attractions such as rollercoasters, zip lines & 4-wheelers.
detail_description: Alpen Park is a vibrant amusement park set in 60,000 square meters of green space with views of the typical Serra Gaucha valley. It offers a wide range of leisure activities, from amusement park rides to extreme sports. The main attraction is the Alpine Coaster, where visitors control the speed of their descent down the mountain on 37 sleds.
name: Alpen Park
address: Rodovia Arnaldo Oppitz, 901 - São João, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Quirky spot for steam power exhibits, with mini replicas of trains, riverboats & other machines.
detail_description: Mundo a Vapor is a unique theme park that showcases various miniature steam-powered machines in full operation. Visitors can marvel at mini replicas of paper mills, potteries, blacksmith shops, steel foundries, and more. One of its notable features is the facade displaying a life-sized reenactment of the famous 1895 train accident at Montparnasse station in Paris.
name: Mundo a Vapor
address: Av. Don Luiz Guanella, 1247 - São José, Canela - RS, 95683-550, Brazil

excerpt: Portraits of Abraham Lincoln, Albert Einstein & other noted figures on display at this wax museum.
detail_description: Dreamland Wax Museum, opened in 2009, has become a classic attraction in Gramado. With around a hundred lifelike wax figures on display, visitors can see iconic personalities like Shrek and Sergio Reis almost side by side. The museum offers a piece of Hollywood with its collection of portraits featuring Abraham Lincoln, Albert Einstein, and other notable figures.
name: Dreamland Wax Museum
address: Av. das Hortênsias, 5507 - Ipê Amarelo, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

excerpt: Old Hollywood–themed museum with gift shop, displaying classic American cars from the 1920s & '60s.
detail_description: Hollywood Dream Cars - Automobile Museum is a vintage car museum with an Old Hollywood theme, showcasing classic American cars from the 1920s to the 1960s. The museum offers visitors a glimpse into the glamour of Hollywood's golden years, featuring automobiles that captivated artists, presidents, and personalities worldwide. It's a must-visit destination for car enthusiasts and those interested in experiencing the allure of vintage Hollywood.
name: Hollywood Dream Cars - Automobile Museum
address: Avenida das Hortênsias, R. Vigilante, 4151, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

detail_description: Catedral de Pedra in Canela is a must-visit for travelers seeking a romantic escape or outdoor adventure. This neo-gothic cathedral, Igreja Matriz de Nossa Senhora de Lourdes, boasts stunning stained glass windows and towering columns. Visitors can explore the charming Rua Coberta nearby, lined with eateries and artisanal shops. For a cultural experience, Casa da Cultura offers museum exhibits and art displays.
name: Catedral de Pedra Canela - Sonho de Natal
address: Praça Matriz, 69 - Centro, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Churrascaria Garfo e Bombacha - Noite Gaúcha offers a self-service system where you can choose from a variety of dishes to accompany the 8-hour roasted rib, including capeletti soup, an array of special cheeses and cured meats, abundant salad bar, traditional hot dishes like carreteiro and assorted grilled meats. The lunch spread also includes fried polenta, lasagna, and grilled cheese among other options.
name: Churrascaria Garfo e Bombacha - Noite Gaúcha
address: RS 466, Caracol - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Parque das Sequoias is a beautiful private park in Canela, Brazil, known for its immense collection of redwood specimens. The park offers well-maintained trails and a variety of old-growth trees, including the Sequoias, which are considered the tallest trees in the world. Each tree is numbered and cataloged, with informational plaques provided to visitors. The park also features picnic areas and parking facilities.
name: Parque das Sequoias
address: R. Godofredo Raimundo, 1747 - Sequoias, Canela - RS, 95682-250, Brazil

excerpt: Historic home with preserved vintage furnishings, a gift shop & 2 tea rooms serving apple pie.
detail_description: Nestled in the charming town of Canela, Castelinho Caracol is a historic home turned museum that showcases vintage furnishings and utensils from a bygone era. The main attraction here is the tea house, where visitors can indulge in one of Brazil's best apfelstrudels. For those looking to simply savor the delicious dessert, there's an option to order it for takeout without paying museum entry.
name: Castelinho Caracol
address: RS - 466, Estr. Parque dos Pinheiros, s/n - Km 03, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Unique outdoor park with intricate miniature replicas of international buildings, plus a cafe.
detail_description: Mini Mundo is a must-visit outdoor park in Gramado, featuring intricate miniature replicas of famous international buildings. This miniature universe has been under construction for over 30 years and showcases detailed replicas of real locations, all at a scale 24 times smaller than the original. The park's central location makes it a popular tourist attraction, with miniatures including the Prince of Monaco's Castle, Curitiba's Botanical Garden, and Porto Alegre's Gasometer.
name: Mini Mundo
address: R. Horácio Cardoso, 291 - Planalto, Gramado - RS, 95675-062, Brazil

detail_description: Matriz Paróquia São Pedro is a must-visit attraction in Gramado, located just 9 km from Canela on the Romantic Route. This stunning church, inaugurated in 1942, is a highlight of the city and a popular tourist spot. The church's beautiful stonemasonry construction and picturesque setting make it a postcard-worthy landmark in the area.
name: Paróquia São Pedro
address: Av. Borges de Medeiros, 2659 - Centro, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

excerpt: Relaxed B&B offering airy quarters with free Wi-Fi, plus an outdoor pool with a waterfall & sundeck.
detail_description: Pousada Doce Canela is a charming B&B in the city of Canela, known for its vintage decor and excellent service. The airy rooms are equipped with amenities such as cable TV, ceiling fans, heaters, and minibars. The main mansion dates back to 1981 and holds historical significance. Surrounded by a peaceful wooded environment, the pousada offers a serene retreat with an outdoor pool featuring a waterfall and sundeck.
name: Pousada Doce Canela
address: R. Adolfo Seibt, 61 - São José, Canela - RS, 95683-472, Brazil

detail_description: Big Land is a unique theme park in Canela, offering an interactive experience with giant toys and objects. It's known as the world's first park themed around gigantism, featuring a machine that makes everything appear larger upon entry. The park caters to all ages and provides an opportunity to relive childhood memories through oversized games and toys. Visitors can expect a delightful time exploring the immense creativity behind each masterpiece while enjoying various activities.
name: Big Land | Parque Temático
address: Após último vagão do trem, R. Ernesto Urbani, 7 - Salas 14 e 15 - Centro, Canela - RS, 95680-216, Brazil

detail_description: Selfie Gramado is a vibrant and modern space designed for creating unique and creative content. With over 160 photo spots spread throughout the park, it offers a variety of colorful and themed environments for all tastes and styles. Inspired by popular locations in Japan and the United States, this venue provides immersive displays and perfect lighting for those Instagram-worthy shots.
name: Selfie Gramado
address: Av. das Hortênsias, 5855 - Carniel, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Beatles Museum is a small attraction that can be explored in about 20 minutes, making it a quick stop for fans of the iconic band. Visitors can enjoy wifi access for sharing their experience instantly. Some guests have suggested adding a large Yellow Submarine outside for photo opportunities and to attract more attention. Despite its size, passionate Beatles fans will appreciate the opportunity to meet the owner at the end of the tour and even get an upgrade with a photo on stage holding instruments.
name: Beatles Museum
address: Av. Don Luiz Guanella, 521 - São José, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

name: Skyglass Canela
address: R. Constante Félix Orsolin, 9800 - Caracol, Canela - RS, 95684-880, Brazil

detail_description: Vitivinícola Jolimont offers a unique enotourism experience, showcasing award-winning wines, excellent sparkling wines, and the elegance of glassware. Founded in 1948 by a visionary Frenchman, this winery invites visitors to indulge their senses in a journey of wine and sparkling wine tasting experiences. Guests can enjoy masterclasses led by knowledgeable hosts and receive a complimentary wine glass with their ticket purchase.
name: Vinícola Jolimont
address: Estrada Morro Calçado, 1420 - Morro Calçado, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

name: Kempinski Laje de Pedra
address: R. das Flores, 222, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Colorful aerial trams with scenic views of wildlands & a waterfall, plus a cafe & gift shop.
detail_description: The Air Cable Cars Da Serra Parks offer an exhilarating experience as you glide above stunning landscapes, including lush wildlands and a breathtaking waterfall. These colorful aerial trams provide not only a smooth ride but also the chance to soak in panoramic views of the surrounding area. Located near various attractions like Caracol Waterfall and Pine Grosso Park, visitors can enjoy a delightful café and gift shop at the base.
name: Air cable cars Da Serra Parks
address: Rua Constante Félix Orsolin, 699 - Caracol, Canela - RS, CEP, 95684-880, Brazil

detail_description: If you're looking for a unique experience, Captain Frosty World is definitely worth a visit! This chilly attraction will transport you back to the frosty vibes of Michigan, USA. While some may find it a bit on the pricier side considering the duration of the visit, the friendly staff truly enhance your time there. Prepare yourself for an unforgettable adventure in one of the coldest places you'll ever encounter, with temperatures dipping as low as -20°C.
name: Captain Frosty World
address: Rodovia RS-466, 3915 Caracol, Canela - RS, 95670-000, Brazil
